The Ner Chat Inc. is an assistive technology software company.

We understand that you are aware of and care about your own personal privacy interests, and we take that seriously. This Privacy Notice describes the Ner Chat Inc.’s policies and practices regarding its collection and use of your personal data, and sets forth your privacy rights. We recognize that information privacy is an ongoing responsibility, and so we will from time to time update this Privacy Notice as we undertake new personal data practices or adopt new privacy policies.

Ner Chat Inc. has appointed an internal data protection officer for you to contact if you have any questions or concerns about Ner Chat Inc.’s personal data policies or practices. If you would like to exercise your privacy rights, please direct your query to Ner Chat Inc.’s data protection officer. Ner Chat Inc.’s data protection officer’s name and contact information are as follows:
How we collect and use (process) your personal information
Ner Chat Inc. collects personal information about its website visitors and customers. With a few exceptions, this information is generally limited to:
We use this information to provide prospects and customers with services.
We do not sell personal information to anyone and only share it with third parties who are facilitating the delivery of our services.

From time to time, Ner Chat Inc. receives personal information about individuals from third parties. Typically, information collected from third parties will include further details on your employer or industry. We may also collect your personal data from a third party website (e.g. LinkedIn)

If you are a student user, please note that Ner Chat Inc. does not use student data for any commercial or marketing purposes. Any student data we collect is used strictly to provide and improve our educational or assistive services, to comply with legal requirements, or as otherwise authorized by the relevant educational institution or you (if applicable). We do not sell, lease, or rent student data to third parties for commercial gain.
Use of the Ner Chat Inc. Website

As is true of most other websites, Ner Chat Inc.’s website collects certain information automatically and stores it in log files. The information may include internet protocol (IP) addresses, the region or general location where your computer or device is accessing the internet, browser type, operating system and other usage information about the use of Ner Chat Inc.’s website, including a history of the pages you view. We use this information to help us design our site to better suit our users’ needs. We may also use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server and to administer our website, analyze trends, track visitor movements, and gather broad demographic information that assists us in identifying visitor preferences.

Ner Chat Inc. has a legitimate interest in understanding how members, customers and potential customers use its website. This assists Ner Chat Inc. with providing more relevant products and services, with communicating value to our sponsors and corporate members, and with providing appropriate staffing to meet member and customer needs.

Ner Chat Inc. uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze site traffic, and improve our services. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us recognize repeat visitors, save preferences, and provide personalized content.
1. Essential Cookies: These are required for website functionality and cannot be disabled.
These are required for website functionality and cannot be disabled.
2. Performance Cookies: These track website usage data to improve site performance and user experience.
These track website usage data to improve site performance and user experience.
3. Functional Cookies: These remember your preferences and settings for a personalized experience.
These remember your preferences and settings for a personalized experience.
4. Marketing Cookies: These track your browsing activity to provide relevant ads and promotions.
These track your browsing activity to provide relevant ads and promotions.

We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics, Intercom, and Cloudflare for analytics, customer support, and security purposes. These services may set their cookies when you interact with our website.

The personal information Ner Chat Inc. collects from you is stored in one or more databases hosted by third parties located in the United States. These third parties do not use or have access to your personal information for any purpose other than cloud storage and retrieval. On occasion, Ner Chat Inc. engages third parties to send information to you, including information about our products, services, and events.

Ner Chat Inc. works with carefully selected third-party service providers to support its platform, including cloud hosting providers such as Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform for data storage and processing. Additionally, tools like MongoDB Atlas and Intercom help with database management and customer communication. All subprocessors operate under strict agreements to ensure secure and compliant handling of personal information.

We do not otherwise reveal your personal data to non-Ner Chat Inc. persons or businesses for their independent use unless: (1) you request or authorize it; (2) it’s in connection with Ner Chat Inc.-hosted and Ner Chat Inc. co-sponsored conferences as described above; (3) the information is provided to comply with the law (for example, compelled by law enforcement to comply with a search warrant, subpoena, or court order), enforce an agreement we have with you, or to protect our rights, property or safety, or the rights, property or safety of our employees or others; (4) the information is provided to our agents, vendors or service providers who perform functions on our behalf; (5) to address emergencies; or (6) to address disputes, claims, or to persons demonstrating legal authority to act on your behalf.

The Ner Chat Inc. website connects with third party services such as Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter and others. If you choose to share information from the Ner Chat Inc. website through these services, you should review the privacy policy of that service. If you are a member of a third party service, the aforementioned connections may allow that service to connect your visit to our site to your personal data.
Transferring personal data to the U.S.

Ner Chat Inc. has its headquarters in the United States. Information we collect about you will be processed in the United States. By using Ner Chat Inc.’s services, you acknowledge that your personal information will be processed in the United States. The United States has not sought nor received a finding of “adequacy” from the European Union under Article 45 of the GDPR. Pursuant to Article 46 of the GDPR, Ner Chat Inc. is providing for appropriate safeguards by entering binding, standard data protection clauses, enforceable by data subjects in the EEA and the UK. These clauses have been enhanced based on the guidance of the European Data Protection Board and will be updated when the new draft model clauses are approved.

Depending on the circumstance, Ner Chat Inc. also collects and transfers to the U.S. personal data with consent; to perform a contract with you; or to fulfill a compelling legitimate interest of Ner Chat Inc. in a manner that does not outweigh your rights and freedoms. Ner Chat Inc. endeavors to apply suitable safeguards to protect the privacy and security of your personal data and to use it only consistent with your relationship with Ner Chat Inc. and the practices described in this Privacy Statement. Ner Chat Inc. also enters into data processing agreements and model clauses with its vendors whenever feasible and appropriate. Since it was founded, Ner Chat Inc. has received zero government requests for information.
For more information or if you have any questions, please contact us at support@nerchat.com
The European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other countries’ privacy laws provide certain rights for data subjects. Data Subject rights under GDPR include the following:
• Rights related to automated decision making including profiling
Rights related to automated decision making including profiling
This Privacy Notice is intended to provide you with information about what personal data Ner Chat Inc. collects about you and how it is used.
If you wish to confirm that Ner Chat Inc. is processing your personal data, or to have access to the personal data Ner Chat Inc. may have about you, please contact us.

You may also request information about: the purpose of the processing; the categories of personal data concerned; who else outside Ner Chat Inc. might have received the data from Ner Chat Inc.; what the source of the information was (if you didn’t provide it directly to Ner Chat Inc.); and how long it will be stored. You have a right to correct (rectify) the record of your personal data maintained by Ner Chat Inc. if it is inaccurate. You may request that Ner Chat Inc. erase that data or cease processing it, subject to certain exceptions. You may also request that Ner Chat Inc. cease using your data for direct marketing purposes. In many countries, you have a right to lodge a complaint with the appropriate data protection authority if you have concerns about how Ner Chat Inc. processes your personal data. When technically feasible, Ner Chat Inc. will—at your request—provide your personal data to you.

Reasonable access to your personal data will be provided at no cost. If access cannot be provided within a reasonable time frame, Ner Chat Inc. will provide you with a date when the information will be provided. If for some reason access is denied, Ner Chat Inc. will provide an explanation as to why access has been denied.

For questions or complaints concerning the processing of your personal data, you can email us at support@nerchat.com. Alternatively, if you are located in the European Union, you can also have recourse to the European Data Protection Supervisor or with your nation’s data protection authority.

Ner Chat Inc. takes reasonable and appropriate steps to protect the personal data entrusted to us from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We also maintain a comprehensive incident response plan that outlines the steps Ner Chat Inc. will take in the event of a security incident. If a data breach occurs, we will promptly investigate, notify affected individuals in accordance with applicable laws and regulations, and take any additional actions required to mitigate the impact.

Your personal data is stored by the Ner Chat Inc. on its servers, and on the servers of the cloud-based database management services the Ner Chat Inc. engages, located in the United States. The Ner Chat Inc. retains service data for the duration of the customer’s business relationship with the Ner Chat Inc. and for a period of time thereafter, to analyze the data for Ner Chat Inc.’s own operations, and for historical and archiving purposes associated with Ner Chat Inc.’s services. Ner Chat Inc. retains prospect data until such time as it no longer has business value and is purged from Ner Chat Inc. systems. All personal data that Ner Chat Inc. controls may be deleted upon verified request from Data Subjects or their authorized agents. For more information on where and how long your personal data is stored, and for more information on your rights of erasure and portability, please contact us at: support@nerchat.com

We do not knowingly attempt to solicit or receive information from children under the age of 13 (or such other age as may be required by local law). For any students using our services under the guidance of an educational institution or parent/guardian, we treat that information as student data. We do not use student data for commercial or marketing purposes, nor do we sell student data to third parties.
